topics.body:
"@Twisty":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/546e3ed76368724d31260100#post_546e3ed76368724d31260100
Is it just me or does that concept sound a lot like a show that tries to make something unique but in the end chickens out and tries to superficially tries to keep what was unique about it but strips away any individuality from it and makes the basic story generic to appeal corporate suits that don't know anything about what makes good television?

The story sounds like this happened:
Concept creator "And that is what makes the show story wise unique"
CEO, "Strip it of it's base story, strip it of it's individuality, raise 30k and we got ourselves a deal"
"[internally going, "fuck you asshole"] . . . Okay"
